title: Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 40 (Nazism, F
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 40 (Nazism, Fascism 3):

We have 28 titles here:

-  Bosworth - Mussolini's Italy; Life Under the Fascist Dictatorship, 1915-1945 (2005)

-  Bowd - Fascist Scotland; Caledonia and the Far Right (2013)

-  Deletant - Hitler's Forgotten Ally; Ion Antonescu and His Regime, Romania 1940-44 (2006)

-  Diamond - Fleeing Hitler; France, 1940 (2007)

-  Dobkowski & Wallimann (Eds.) - Radical Perspectives on the Rise of Fascism in Germany, 1919-1945 (1989)

-  Duggan - Fascist Voices; an Intimate History of Mussolini's Italy (2013)

-  Epstein - Model Nazi; Arthur Greiser and the Occupation of Western Poland (2010)

-  Gildea et al (Eds.) - Surviving Hitler and Mussolini; Daily Life in Occupied Europe (2006)

-  Goldberg - Liberal Fascism; the Secret History of the American Left from Mussolini to the Politics of Meaning (2007)

-  Hann - Physical Resistance; a Hundred Years of Anti-Fascism (2012)

-  Hunt - On Hitler's Mountain; Overcoming the Legacy of a Nazi Childhood (2005)

-  Kertzer - The Pope and Mussolini; the Secret History of Piux XI and the Rise of Fascism in Europe (2014)

-  Knox - To the Threshold of Power, 1922-33; Origins and Dynamics of the Fascist and National Socialist Dictatorships, Vol. 1 (2007)

-  Lane - Victims of Stalin and Hitler; the Exodus of Poles and Balts to Britain (2004)

-  Levenda - Ratline; Soviet Spies, Nazi Priests, and the Disappearance of Adolf Hitler (2012)

-  Lower - Hitler's Furies; German Women in the Nazi Killing Fields (2013)

-  Lyttelton (Ed.) - Liberal and Fascist Italy, 1900-1945 (2002)

-  Magilow et al (Eds.) - Nazisploitation; the Nazi Image in Low-Brow Cinema and Culture (2012)

-  Overy - The Dictators; Hitler's Germany and Stalin's Russia (2006)

-  Preparata - Conjuring Hitler; How Britain and America Made the Third Reich (2005)

-  Price - Dispatches from the Weimar Republic; Versailles and German Fascism (1999)

-  Rees - World War II Behind Closed Doors; Stalin, the Nazis and the West (2008)

-  Renton - Fascism; Theory and Practice (1999)

-  Sassoon - Mussolini and the Rise of Fascism (2007)

-  Sayner - Women without a Past; German Autobiographical Writings and Fascism (2007)

-  Sternhell - The Birth of Fascist Ideology; From Cultural Rebellion to Political Revolution (1994)

-  Timaneanu - The Devil in History; Communism, Fascism, and Some Lessons of the Twentieth Century (2012)

-  Wilson - Nazi Princess; Hitler, Lord Rothermere and Princess Stephanie Von Hohenlohe (2011)
